title: Drawing, Design for Art Deco Store Windows Displaying Figurine, Lamps, Bowls, and Plates, ca. 1925
title_raw: Design for Art Deco Store Windows Displaying Figurine, Lamps, Bowls, and Plates
medium: Brush and brown watercolor, white gouache, graphite on green paperboard
markings: At lower right, small [1/2 x 1 in.] Kilemnik stamp in black:  KILEMNIK & Cia/524 FLORIDA
description: View of storefront with central window and partial views of windows on each side.  Rear of windows has low platform decorated with narrow vertical wrought iron bars from floor to top of windows.  Lower section of background walls is brown;  upper section shows wrought iron with geometric design in central panel.  Display features assortment of bowls, lamps, plates and figurine holding a tray.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, Design for Art Deco Store Windows Displaying Figurine, Lamps, Bowls, and Plates, ca. 1925. Brush and brown watercolor, white gouache, graphite on green paperboard. 
Gift of Maureen Cogan. 1999-39-19
